abstract: BHP Billiton denied speculation on Monday that it planned to sell any of Potash Corp.’s assets if it succeeds with its $38.6 billion hostile bid for the world’s largest fertilizer producer.
snippet: BHP Billiton denied speculation on Monday that it planned to sell any of Potash Corp.’s assets if it succeeds with its $38.6 billion hostile bid for the world’s largest fertilizer producer.
lead_paragraph: BHP Billiton denied speculation on Monday that it planned to sell any of Potash Corp.‘s assets if it succeeds with its $38.6 billion hostile bid for the world’s largest fertilizer producer, Reuters reported.

headline.main: BHP Says It Wouldn’t Divest Potash Assets
